name: Chicken Pesto Wrap
description: Chicken, pesto, spinach and sun-dried tomatoes in a tortilla.
preparationSteps: In a bowl, mix Greek yogurt with honey until well combined.
Start assembling the parfait in glasses or bowls. Begin with a spoonful of the Greek yogurt mixture at the bottom.
Add a layer of granola on top of the yogurt.
Follow with a layer of mixed berries.
Repeat the layers until you've used up all the ingredients, finishing with a few berries on top.
Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to enjoy.
To eat, you can either mix all the layers together or scoop each layer with a spoon for a variety of flavors in each bite.
